attributes.action: PE should not be a core subject in secondary school!
attributes.additional_details: As a GCSE student, I don't think that P.E is going to help us in the future unless we want to become a PE teacher, personal trainer, Athlete etc. Therefore, we should have the right to choose.
attributes.background: Some students get bullied in PE because they're not good at doing the activities they are told to do e.g running, and some students are not confident enough to do PE. I personally think that PE should not be a core subject, it should be our choice if we want to study this subject or not.
